item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: A horse-riding permit. And it has Anna's name and ID on it.

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: (I guess Felix did steal it after all. I wonder what for?)

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: What?? Why is this in Felix's house???

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: No idea. Why was he trying to butter Anna up after he'd just stolen her permit?

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Felix is... strange, to say the least. He arrived at the village three weeks ago. I don't know a lot about him.

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: Three weeks ago?? That guy talks like he owns the place.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Well, when you're not talking to him about politics he's a pretty nice guy.

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: Let's get this back to Anna.
